titles.title: Fair Share Act of 1993
A bill to require the use, in Federal formula grant programs, of adjusted census data, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1198-1199)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Fair Share Act of 1993 - Requires the use of the most recent annual population data when determining the amount of benefit under Federal programs for a State, county, or local unit of government.
